resources.string: App needs to be launched once to be able to access the camera in the background

On Android 11+ before starting a background recording service app has to be launched and visible at least once to be able to use camera in background. So after a device reboot make app visible and after that don\'t close recording service, it should stay in notification center
Video recording has been stopped because camera is used by another app
Video recording has been stopped because device camera has stopped working
Camera was in use by other app. Please don\'t use or start other apps which may use camera while recording videos. Android allows only one app to use camera at the same time

Failed to open the selected camera. It so happens that not all hidden cameras can be used by any application. Many manufacturers only allow their use in their native applications. The default camera will open.
Camera (was) temporarily unavailable for opening on your device (system camera error)
This device doesn\'t have built-in camera and doesn\'t support external cameras. Closing…
Cancel locking current video from overwriting?
Thank you so much for support!
If you want ad-free app the donation has to be or more
For smaller donations, advertising is removed only on the main screen
Purchases info is not loaded yet. Is network connection available and is signed in Google account?
If you have already made a donation, then to restore purchases, please reinstall the application in Google Play after selecting the correct Google account
Remove ads forever with a one-time donation of any amount.
You can also donate monthly to remove ads.
Advertising is completely removed while a subscription for any amount per month is active.
The application does not provide a trial period for subscriptions, since all features of the application are already free, subscription only removes advertising
Advertising is completely removed while the subscription is active.
The subscription can be canceled at any time (the “cancel subscription” button will be available, you can also cancel it in the Google Play application)
The application is not excluded from battery optimization. If the camera is not running in the background or something else, then add this application to the exceptions of the power saving mode.
If you reinstalled App on Android 11, then the old files must be deleted manually
You have stopped the background service for automatically starting video recording. Open the application to launch it again.
Battery optimization -> All apps -> Find the app -> Do not optimize/save
This is a beta version of the application, so some things may not work or be unstable.
Install the stable version from the play store to avoid errors.
Device camera service has died, restarting…
Close app settings before starting recording
Could not enable microphone, recording will continue without audio
Could not open those settings from this app, please try to find them using default (system) settings app of the device
Could not start a floating window
G-sensor has detected impact, video will be locked from overwriting
Disable battery optimization for this app in your device settings to avoid future camera errors
An error occurred while accessing the camera. Battery optimization enabled
Please install a web-browser app to open a link
No network to fetch address or try to reboot device
Could not delete video file. You may have reinstalled the app and permission for the file was lost, try to delete it manually
Please free some space to continue video recording

The application\'s main screen could not be launched because the SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (display on top of all other application windows) permission was not granted or the device\'s screen was turned off
The specified application could not be launched to open automatically because the \"show on top of all applications\" permission was not granted.
The application could not be opened because the screen was turned off (locked).
The application could not be opened to start recording because the screen was turned off (locked). Run a background recording service (AutoStart) to fix this.
The app could not be opened to start recording because the \"show on top of all apps\" permission was not granted. Click to provide
Please close other apps which use a camera and restart this app

Please delete old videos, format SD card or try another one. Please also limit the maximum space for recording videos (less space is better). Many saved videos can cause such issues. Read FAQ about SD cards at Settings/FAQ. You can also try to record to phone storage instead
Stopping recording. No enough memory to continue
Please wait a second before stopping recording immediately after starting
To change camera the current recording has to be stopped
video was locked from overwriting and saved, next video will also be marked as locked (can be canceled by clicking lock button)
All videos size is of allowed max space
There is not enough battery power on the device. Put on charge or start recording if the charge is higher 1%%
Something went wrong with recoding module.
TTS (Android speech synthesizer) language package is not installed. Enable internet to start downloading it
Could not start recording service. Please click to disable battery optimization for this app
Audio permission is needed for adding audio during video recording
Camera permission is needed for video recording and camera preview
This app needs permission for Camera for video recording. But you have declined it. Closing… Try to give Camera permission in System Settings for this app
The location is needed to draw coordinates, address and speed on the recorded video, or display this data on the main screen (depending on your settings).
Notifications are required to be able to display the background recording service and recording status in the notification panel.
Storage permission is needed for saving video files to shared public media folder and for loop recording mode
You must grant Nearby Devices (Bluetooth) permission for automatic event recording. This can be done in the application\'s system settings.
Please try to select a different path (device local storage)
Disabled because this device doesn\'t support geocoding
Record audio from a Bluetooth device
Use only with Bluetooth headphones. If you connect to the head unit (car radio) via Bluetooth, then for some reason this may automatically trigger a phone call to the standard number on this device
Do not use with head unit (car radio)!
Audio recording permission is not granted

If enabled, other applications will not be able to use the microphone. If disabled, this application may not be able to record audio when multiple applications are running using the microphone (Android does not always allow simultaneous use of the microphone)
Audio recording from CAMCORDER may not work on some devices, in this case try changing to MIC

This ensures that the CPU (processor) is running (to receive Bluetooth, charging or AUX events).\nYou can disable this option to save battery power when recording is not active. In practice, the processor should not fall asleep, but if this happens on your device, then leave this option enabled.
Keep the CPU on (\"Wake Lock\") for the background service \"Watcher\" (uses more battery power).
Starts recording automatically when app launches
Select specific bluetooth device or any
Starts recording automatically when a bluetooth device connects. For the bluetooth watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin

Starts recording automatically when system starts, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin. It can take several minutes after boot before the system informs the app that it has started
Starts recording automatically when starts charging. For the charging watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin

Starts recording automatically when audio is connected to phone jack (AUX). For the audio watcher service to start after rebooting the device, the device (screen) has to be unlocked if there a password/pin
Battery optimization can stop app from working right (e.g. using camera or location updates during background video recording). Tap this to disable it for this app now
Battery optimization may prevent the application from working correctly (for example, using the camera and microphone). Click here to disable it for this application now
Signal at the beginning of the recording of the next video file
The device manufacturer may not provide access to all cameras, so some may not open
The device manufacturer may not provide a wide lens camera for all apps
Automatically turn on the flashlight when recording
Size of buttons on floating window
The device manufacturer may not provide 60 FPS for all apps
Ignore GPS updates with error higher
Show warning if GPS and Google Location Accuracy are disabled
Show warning only if GPS disabled
Do not show warning and the fix button
GPS disabled warning and the fix button

Your device has settings to allow apps to auto-start and run in the background. Click here and add the app to exceptions (allow autostart, etc.) to allow background and off screen work if it\'s forbidden
Allowing background and off screen work
Open app when recording starts automatically
Launch app when video recording starts
With Android 11 and higher, you may not be able to select any of the installed apps as the system itself restricts app visibility (privacy policy)
App to launch by the button
Update location using GPS only (don\'t use network)
If speed values are bad then try the old method. If values are zero or rarely updated then try the new method
Balance between location accuracy (coordinates), speed and battery power consumption.
The most accurate location (coordinates) and speed due to greater battery power consumption.
Low accuracy of location (coordinates) and speed due to low battery power consumption.
Power Saving should be turned off to be able to get location (GPS) updates in the background.
Automatically delete oldest videos during recording if there is not enough space for new videos
Keep screen on only when recording
Enable to use miles instead of kilometers
The recording path is not set, click here to set it
Recording Location (Folder), Video Duration, Loop Recording, G-shock sensor, GPS
Location of video recordings (folder to save), video duration, loop recording, maximum video size
Select elements to be shown on screen
Video duration - How often to save
Rate this App on Play Store
Lock video from auto-deleting (overwriting) on impact detection
For Bluetooth events it is only possible if the \"record only when charging\" option is disabled.

Do not launch the AutoStart application service to save battery while waiting for events to autostart recording. For Android 8+ this is possible if only Bluetooth events are enabled and the rest are disabled.

* You can turn this option off to have the app perform automatic recording only when the app's background service (AutoStart) is running.
- Automatic recording for events such as charging, Bluetooth or AUX can be performed without problems up to Android 7.1.
- Starting from Android 8+, automatic recording without a background application service (AutoStart) can only be performed for Bluetooth events, and in other cases (when charging or AUX) you need to first start the background application service (AutoStart) - by launching the application itself once.
- Starting with Android 11+, without the background app service (AutoStart), accessing the camera without user interaction to start recording is only possible if the "on top of all apps" permission is granted.
Automatic recording even if the background service is not running (AutoStart)
Start recording when speed is equal to/greater than (based on GPS)
Stop recording when there is no movement
Stop recording when speed is below (based on GPS)
Recording only when the device is charging
Max memory of all videos (loop recording)
On the app start, on charging on/off, on connecting a Bluetooth device, AUX, on the device boot
Short/Long taps, keep screen on, display address and speed, floating window, buttons, etc
Shortcut to start recording, quick and long press on the screen, pop-up window, vibration when recording, sound notification, vibration, buttons on the screen, turning off the screen and more
Automatically switches camera day/night modes at specific time (sunrise and sunset)
Higher bitrate better quality but larger video file size
More FPS - smoother video, but also drains battery. It\'s better to set first value to the lowest (second can be bigger) for better recording in the darkness
Some devices may limit the maximum file size to 4 GB, so you need to select settings (bitrate, duration, resolution) so that one video file does not exceed 4 GB
Send this App to your Friends or Family
To start/stop recording without launching the main screen
Displays overlay with control buttons over all apps
Show floating window only when recording is active (and close automatically when it stops)
It\'s not supported by current camera. Manufacturers often restrict its use and it\'s available only in standard Camera app
Display a message when starting or stopping recording during background recording
Voice over when recording starts, stops or fails
These options can significantly consume the battery and heat up the device. For video recordings, the main information is time, so all GPS options can be disabled, including interface settings
GPX - an XML schema designed as a common GPS data format for software applications. It can be used to describe waypoints, tracks, and routes
Create GPX file for each video
Overlay subtitles at the bottom of the video
Overlay Captions on Video: Date (Timestamp), Location Address, Coordinates and Speed
Overlay captions on videos: date (time stamp), custom text
Frequent updates - faster battery runs out
Report about error, crash or make a suggestion
Allow this app to show on top of all other apps. It\'s needed to auto start/stop video recording or for displaying floating window
Allow this app to appear on top of all other apps. This is necessary to display a floating window
Display on top of other applications
Go back to main (recording) screen to apply this setting (to start watcher service)
Help improve or fix the translation of text in your language
Change the icon and name of the application in the system
After the change, the application may close, the old icon will be removed on the main screen of the phone (or in the list of all applications), and a new one will appear
Set the icon and name of the launcher
Show camera preview on main app screen
Vibration when starting or stopping recording
This camera has been hidden by the manufacturer and may not work.
H.265 HEVC and AV1 codecs provide better quality at lower bitrates than H.264 AVC, so you can save space by reducing the bitrate. But videos may not play in some video players
Disable if you want to manually control sensor frame duration, exposure time, sensitivity, and aperture
Horizontally flip of video frames. Only for video recording, it doesn\'t change preview
Resolution, Bitrate, Orientation, Focus, Camera, Night mode
This is necessary to get the most accurate GPS-based speed, as well as address and coordinates. Tap to grant it
Required to be able to display the background recording service and statuses on the notification panel. Tap to grant it
Automatic recording over Bluetooth connections requires permission. Click here to submit
To access the ultra wide-angle camera (lens), you can set the zoom ratio to
At the moment, audio recording is not possible because the microphone is intercepted by another application
The app uses Firebase Analytics for basic anonymous analytics (see link below)

The application uses the following permissions:
- Open anonymous device identifier OAID (for personalized advertising)
- CAMERA, AUDIO (for video recording)
- STORAGE (for saving video recordings)
- LOCATION (to get the address of the current location, GPS coordinates, speed - to show on the main screen of the application and overlay as subtitles on the video)
- INTERNET (advertising)

Privacy: All videos you record will be saved only on your local device. The application does not backup your videos (does not have any connections to servers)\n\nThe app will continue to run in the background (the foreground service that appears in the notification bar) while recording is active, when you return to the home screen, switch to another app or lock your phone to be able to continue recording, and when you turn on features for automatic recording (if you close the background service, these functions will not work).
A new video recording started with audio recording
A new video recording started without audio recording
Not enough space. Available space is
Set a timer to start recording
Cancel automatic video recording based on the current timer?
Time was set in the past
Timer service for automatically starting video recording
Ask which player to play in
Are you sure you want to delete this video file?
Are you sure you want to delete those video files?
Are you sure you want to delete this video folder?
Are you sure you want to delete those video folders?
Video file was moved to Locked folder
Please open settings of the app and allow storage permission
Please select a folder for records
